content.question: Blocks <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> have masses <math alttext="M" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="2 M" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, respectively. When the blocks are released from rest, block <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> accelerates downward with acceleration <math alttext="lowercase a" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.
